vtksave.cpp File Reference

save scene to png file More...

Detailed Description

save scene to png file

vtksave([HANDLE,] size, filename)

Parameters:
[in] HANDLE (optional) explicit VTK handle
[in] filename string of the filename
[in] config (optional) config structure (see Configuration parameters)
Saves the current rendering into a png file of the given size. Either as static png image or as VRML scene (only polygon data can be exported)

Configuration:
saveFormat file format of saved scene: "png" (default), "pov" or "vrml" imageDimension base size of screenshot size: i.e. 640x480 magnification multiplier for screenshot size, default: 1 (640x480 with multiplier of 2 -> 1280x960)
Todo:
add parameter (multiples) for large image scaling, as vtkLargeImageFilter is used
